name: Bloom Barrage
description:
Bloom Barrage The Competitive Gardening Game

for iOS, Android, PC, and Mac

currently in development

projected release: May 2019

We are currently live on Kickstarter! Learn more about the project and make a pledge by visiting http://bit.do/bloombarrage

These are the PC and Mac beta versions of the game. If you would like to try the Android or iOS version, go to http://bit.do/BloomBarrageBeta. We would appreciate any feedback you have to give.

More information!
